DOC.criteria: Gender : male female Age start study : male female ≥ 21and ≤ 65 year Females take contraceptive pill post menopausal Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.5 ≤ 27 kg/m2 Apparently healthy : measure questionnaire , report current previous metabolic diseases chronic gastrointestinal disorder Reported dietary habit : medically prescribe diet , slimming diet within past 3 month , use eat 3 meal day Reported intense sporting activity ≤ 10h/w Reported alcohol consumption ≤21 units/w Informed consent sign Recruitment form fill Smoking Premenopausal females take contraceptive pill Dislike , allergy intolerance test product Possible eating disorder ( measure SCOFF questionnaire score > 1 ) Eating habit questionnaire score > 14 Reported medical treatment may affect eat habits/satiety Food allergy intolerance
